thread.title: Jeremy Renner Gives Elizabeth Olsen a Friendly Kiss During Sundance Interview
thread.title_full: Jeremy Renner Gives Elizabeth Olsen a Friendly Kiss During Sundance Interview

author: Just Jared
title: Jeremy Renner Gives Elizabeth Olsen a Friendly Kiss During Sundance Interview
text:
Elizabeth Olsen gets a friendly kiss from her Wind River co-star Jeremy Renner during an interview at the IMDb Studio during the 2017 Sundance Film Festival on Sunday (January 22) in Park City, Utah.
The actors were joined by the film’s writer and director Taylor Sheridan .
During the interview, Elizabeth was asked about her first time at Sundance in 2011 for Martha Marcy May Marlene and Jeremy had never heard of the film.
Lizzie and Jeremy have worked together on The Avengers: Age of Ultron , Captain America: Civil War , and now Wind River , so it sounds like he needs to get to know her better than he already should!
After Jeremy started to undermine all the things that Elizabeth was saying, in a joking manner, he gave her a friendly kiss on the cheek and said, “I love you.” Watch the cute video below!
